video.title: MonsterQuest
video.synopsis: Employing the latest advances in scientific research, the existence of legendary creatures like Sasquatch, werewolves and vampires is put to the test.

episodes.synopsis: Does a giant prehistoric creature lurk in Lake Champlain? Eyewitnesses are rumored to have seen a dinosaurlike animal that resembles the plesiosaur.
episodes.title: America's Loch Ness Monster

episodes.synopsis: Does Canada have its own Bigfoot? Owners of a fly-in fishing cabin report attacks by an unknown creature. Can DNA tests reveal its true identity?
episodes.title: Sasquatch Attack?

episodes.synopsis: Is the Kraken a real creature or just a legend? Take an expedition where fishermen regularly claim to encounter large schools of giant squid.
episodes.title: Giant Squid Found?

episodes.synopsis: American Indians have long revered the Thunderbird, a giant bird with a 15-foot wingspan. Could there really be one, or is it mass hysteria?
episodes.title: Birdzilla

episodes.synopsis: Bigfoot has been sighted! Join an all-female expedition as they try to lure what appears to be a Bigfoot within range of their cameras.
episodes.title: Bigfoot

episodes.synopsis: A number of pets were killed by a creature that locals described as a mutant. One of these creatures was hit by a car, and its DNA will be tested.
episodes.title: Mutant Canines

episodes.synopsis: Mountain lions occasionally attack humans, and when they do, it makes headlines. However, people are reportedly seeing attacks by large black cats.
episodes.title: Lions in the Backyard

episodes.synopsis: Are monster fish lurking in lakes and rivers? From the Arctic Circle to the Amazon, follow an expedition to find the biggest and nastiest giant fish.
episodes.title: Gigantic Killer Fish

episodes.synopsis: Are the vast swamps of Louisiana and Florida hiding a monster? Many locals believe so and call the 7-foot-tall beast "the swamp creature."
episodes.title: Swamp Beast

episodes.synopsis: In 2006, The New York Times revealed a plan by Josef Stalin to create monsters by crossing humans with apes. Travel to Russia to find out if it's true.
episodes.title: Russia's Killer Apemen

episodes.synopsis: For decades, cameras have been capturing images of a flying, torpedolike creature. Some believe it may be a creature from another dimension.
episodes.title: Unidentified Flying Creatures

episodes.synopsis: MonsterQuest travels to the interior of Sumatra, Indonesia, looking for what locals call the Orang Pendek, which translates as "man of the woods."
episodes.title: The Real Hobbit

episodes.synopsis: The werewolf is a centuries-old legend based on myth. However, local eyewitnesses in Wisconsin and Michigan report seeing a tall, hairy man-beast.
episodes.title: American Werewolf

episodes.synopsis: Great white sharks are the ocean's deadliest killers, and as they swim closer to our beaches, attacks against humans are on the rise.
episodes.title: Monster Sharks

episodes.synopsis: Legends of a monster lurking in the hills of Kentucky date back to the days of Daniel Boone, but encounters with this mystery beast are increasing.
episodes.title: Hillbilly Beast

episodes.synopsis: For more than 100 years, giant pythons have been discovered in parts of the Sunshine State, but since Hurricane Andrew, their territory has spread.
episodes.title: Giant Pythons in America

episodes.synopsis: More than 50 years ago, South American scientists attempted to crossbreed bees that would produce more honey. But instead, they created a monster.
episodes.title: Giant Killer Bees

episodes.synopsis: In 1967, a giant winged monster reportedly terrorized a town in West Virginia. The incident ended in a tragic bridge collapse that claimed 46 lives.
episodes.title: Mothman

episodes.synopsis: For centuries, the Amazon has been home to a frightening feeding frenzy of the most ferocious freshwater monsters known to man: piranhas.
episodes.title: Piranha Invasion

episodes.synopsis: In 1952, witnesses in Flatwoods, W.V., reportedly encountered a nightmarish beast that was humanlike in appearance but with reptilian skin.
episodes.title: Lizard Monster

episodes.synopsis: "MonsterQuest" heads to the heart of California, where witnesses are encountering aggressively territorial packs of Sasquatch.
episodes.title: Sierra Sasquatch

episodes.synopsis: History says that a large, wolflike beast is the stuff of legend, but recently uncovered footage and new witnesses say that something is out there.
episodes.title: America's Wolfman
